attributes.additional_details: To appreciate what all care staff and everyone working in the NHS has done for all of use. I did notice that at the end of last year the MPs awarded themselves a generous pay rise .I am vey angry that the NHS workers are only getting a 1% pay rise, they have worked to the point where they are exhausted and have been brought to their knees , A lot of NHS staff were off sick with stress,  we have all seen on TV that sadly some have died looking after others, not to forget they saved the PMs life. !!!!
attributes.background: Give care staff and NHS workers a decent pay rise not the derogatory      1% that the UK GOVERNMENT  has awarded to them.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
